name: 2022 5th International Conference on Healthcare Service Management
content: ◆ICHSM 2022 publication information: 1\. Accepted papers of ICHSM 2022 will be published in International Conference Proceedings which will be indexed by Ei Compendex and Scopus, and submitted to be reviewed by Thomson Reuters Conference Proceedings Citation Index (ISI Web of Science). 2\. Special Journal Issues: All submitted full paper will have opportunities for consideration for the Special Journal Issue. The final decision for paper selection will be made based on peer review reports by the Guest Editors. ★ International Journal of Medical Sciences(SCI, IF2.523) http://mdecisionlab.csmu.edu.tw/file/Special Issue for International Journal of Medical Sciences.pdf ★ Open Medicine(SCI, IF1.221) http://mdecisionlab.csmu.edu.tw/file/open medicine.pdf ★ International Journal of Environmental Research and Public Health (SCI, IF2.849) https://www.mdpi.com/journal/ijerph/special\_issues/data\_model\_health\_2 ★ Journal of Electronic Science and Technology (Scopus, INSPEC) http://www.keaipublishing.com/en/journals/journal-of-electronic-science-and-technology/call-for-papers/in-silico-research-on-microbiology-and-public-health/ ★ Frontier in Genetics (IF 3.260, Genetics & Heredity) https://www.frontiersin.org/research-topics/17355/using-physical-genomics-markers-for-smart-therapy-via-expert-systems-with-computer-learning ★ Journal of Data Analysis (ACI , EconLit) https://www.ipress.tw/J0068
